function.description:
Renames an existing collection. Returns `NULL`. A robot exception will be generated if you provide a `target` that is the name of an existing collection and `dropTarget` is `false`, or if `collection` is the name of a collection that doesn't exist. The `dropTarget` parameter may contain the following value:
| Option | Description | | ---------- | ----------- | | `dropTarget` | If `true`, mongod drops the target collection prior to renaming the collection. The default value is `false`.

example.title: Usage
